name: ai-clean
description: This project consists of three parts: 1.  **Frontend**: The React dashboard. 2.  **Backend**: The Node.js server that updates the database. 3.  **ML Service**: The Python service that predicts machine health.

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd .. && cd backend && npm install
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:ml"
